text: OMG the water is rising fast at my mom's house near 5th and Elm! I think the power lines are down too.
Just saw a huge plume of smoke coming from the downtown bank building. Hope everyone is safe!
Earthquake just hit! Felt it strong in West LA. Dishes fell off the shelves.
Can anyone confirm if the 5th and Elm area is flooded? My aunt lives there and isn't answering.
Fire at the First National Bank downtown! Fire trucks are on the way.
Fake news! There is no fire downtown. Just a movie set.
Serious flooding reported at 5th St & Elm St. Avoid the area. Power lines down.
My dog is missing after the quake. West LA area near Santa Monica Blvd.
Smoke is getting thicker downtown. I can see flames now from my office window.
Power outage in West LA. Traffic lights are out.
